VIEWS_SPEC.VIEW_TEXT: (MODIFIED_BY,PID,SUBSCRIPTION_ID,CHANNEL_ID,FILTER_KEYWORDS,NOTIFY_BY_EMAIL,USER_ID,STATUS,CREATED_ON,CREATED_BY,MODIFIED_ON) AS select chn_modified_by modified_by, (select DD_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID from ms_rga_subs_channel)pid, subscription_id, channel_name channel_id, filter_keywords, notify_by_email, chn_created_by user_id, status, chn_created_on created_on, chn_created_by created_by, chn_modified_on modified_on from ms_rga_subs_channel_chn
